Feb 20, 2004

Encyclopedia

When I was little I loved the Encyclopedia Brown detective stories, so I was happy to see this clever use of them to make fun of Bush. But then I discovered a whole trove of contemporary Encyclopedia Brown stories! Topics include music piracy and Bush v. Gore.

Vérité

Truth died a little today. I know it sounds trite, but how else to talk about the death of Jean Rouch, who died in a car crash in Niger at the age of 86? Rouch is famed for his provocative style of documentary filmmaking, which came to be known as Cinéma Vérité. It is a name that he himself took from the Russian, Kino Pravda, or “film truth”, ...
